cause.description:
Men and women unite to bring this inhumane practice to an end!! Someone has to stand up and start the ball rolling.. It is getting out of hand and if we don't interfere now, where is it going to end.. ? I still think that these are men!
1. All female body builders must realise their ugliness!
2. Looking after your body is great, doing this is damaging!
3. Which guy would want to be with a girl like this, unless he has hidden masculine agenda's?
cause.mission: bring to everyones attention, the sad state of affairs when a female can beat up a man-easily!
cause.name: The reason why women shouldn't gym!
